cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 5 miles north of Barbuda and 40 miles north of Antigua
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest across the northern Leeward Islands toward the Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas and ultimately toward south-central Florida late this weekend
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: 0 (center not forecast to move offshore near Pascagoula)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, Turks & Caicos, southeastern and central Bahamas, northern Cuba and South Florida
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible late in the 5-day period, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely (â‰¤3% chance).
weather_observation.rainfall: Only light outer-band showers are possible; heavy rainfall is unlikely.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would impact normal port operations.
